languages.text: {n}Бросив на вас тоскливый взгляд, юноша произносит:{/n} "Только я все равно права не имею секретные данные разглашать. Хоть вы и Вольный Торговец, а у меня приказ. А за нарушение приказа мне господин губернатор язык вырвет и в сервиторы сошлет".

{n}He glances at you sadly and says,{/n} "But still, I can't divulge anything classified. You may be a Rogue Trader, but I have my orders. And if I don't follow them, the governor will have my tongue ripped out and demote me to a servitor."
languages.original_text: {n}Бросив на вас тоскливый взгляд, юноша произносит:{/n} "Только я все равно права не имею секретные данные разглашать. Хоть вы и Вольный Торговец, а у меня приказ. А за нарушение приказа мне господин губернатор язык вырвет и в сервиторы сошлет".

traits.locale_text: {n}He glances at you sadly and says,{/n} "But I still can't divulge anything classified. You may be a Rogue Trader, but I have my orders. And if I don't follow them, the governor will have my tongue ripped out and turn me into a servitor."

{n}He glances at you sadly and says,{/n} "But I still can't divulge anything classified. You may be a Rogue Trader, but I have my orders. And if I don't follow them, the governor will have my tongue ripped out and turn me into a servitor."

{n}He glances at you sadly and says,{/n} "But still, I can't divulge anything classified. You may be a Rogue Trader, but I have my orders. And if I don't follow them, the governor will have my tongue ripped out and demote me to a servitor."

{n}He glances at you sadly and says,{/n} "But still, I can't divulge anything classified. You may be a Rogue Trader, but I have my orders. And if I don't follow them, the governor will have my tongue ripped out and demote me to a servitor."

{n}He glances at you sadly and says,{/n} "But still, I can't divulge anything classified. You may be a Rogue Trader, but I have my orders. And if I don't follow them, the governor will have my tongue ripped out and demote me to a servitor."

{n}He glances at you sadly and says,{/n} "But still, I can't divulge anything classified. You may be a Rogue Trader, but I have my orders. And if I don't follow them, the governor will have my tongue ripped out and demote me to a servitor."

languages.text: {n}Er blickt dich traurig an und sagt:{/n} "Und trotzdem kann ich keine Geheiminformationen preisgeben. Ihr seid vielleicht {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, aber ich habe meine Befehle. Und wenn ich sie nicht befolge, lässt der Gouverneur mir die Zunge herausreißen und degradiert mich zum Servitoren."
languages.original_text: {n}He glances at you sadly and says,{/n} "But still, I can't divulge anything classified. You may be a Rogue Trader, but I have my orders. And if I don't follow them, the governor will have my tongue ripped out and demote me to a servitor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er blickt dich traurig an und sagt:{/n} "Und trotzdem kann ich keine Geheiminformationen preisgeben. Ihr seid vielleicht {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, aber ich habe meine Befehle. Und wenn ich sie nicht befolge, lässt der Gouverneur mir die Zunge herausreißen und degradiert mich zum Servitoren."

languages.text: {n}Il vous lance un regard triste et ajoute :{/n} « Cela dit, je ne puis divulguer de renseignements confidentiels. Vous êtes peut-être libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}, mais moi, j'ai mes ordres et si je les transgresse, le gouverneur m'arrachera la langue et fera de moi un servitor. »
languages.original_text: {n}He glances at you sadly and says,{/n} "But still, I can't divulge anything classified. You may be a Rogue Trader, but I have my orders. And if I don't follow them, the governor will have my tongue ripped out and demote me to a servitor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il vous lance un regard triste et ajoute :{/n} « Cela dit, je ne puis divulguer de renseignements confidentiels. Vous êtes peut-être libre-{mf|marchand|marchande}, mais moi, j'ai mes ordres et si je les transgresse, le gouverneur m'arrachera la langue et fera de moi un servitor. »

languages.text: {n}他瞥了你一眼，悲伤地说道。{/n}“但即便如此，我仍然不能泄露任何机密。或许您确实是位行商浪人，但我也有我的命令。如果我不遵守命令，总督就要割掉我的舌头，把我做成机仆。”
languages.original_text: {n}He glances at you sadly and says,{/n} "But still, I can't divulge anything classified. You may be a Rogue Trader, but I have my orders. And if I don't follow them, the governor will have my tongue ripped out and demote me to a servitor."

traits.locale_text: {n}他瞥了你一眼，悲伤地说道。{/n}“但即便如此，我仍然不能泄露任何机密。或许您确实是位行商浪人，但我也有我的命令。如果我不遵守命令，总督就要割掉我的舌头，把我做成奴工。”

languages.text: {n}青年は嘆かわしそうにあなたを見つめて話す。{/n}「ただですね、機密を漏らすわけにはいかないんです。陛下は自由開拓者かもしれませんが、僕も命令を受けてます。従わなければ、総督は僕の舌をひっこ抜いてサーヴィターに降格させるでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}He glances at you sadly and says,{/n} "But still, I can't divulge anything classified. You may be a Rogue Trader, but I have my orders. And if I don't follow them, the governor will have my tongue ripped out and demote me to a servitor."

traits.locale_text: {n}青年は嘆かわしそうにあなたを見つめて話す。{/n}「ただですね、機密を漏らすわけにはいかないんです。閣下は自由開拓者かもしれませんが、僕も命令を受けてます。従わなければ、総督は僕の舌をひっこ抜いてサーヴィターに降格させるでしょう」

languages.text: {n}Te mira con tristeza y dice,{/n} «Pero aún así, no puedo revelar nada confidencial. Puede que sea Comerciante Independiente, pero tengo mis órdenes. Y si no las sigo, el gobernador me arrancará la lengua y me degradará a sirviente».
languages.original_text: {n}He glances at you sadly and says,{/n} "But still, I can't divulge anything classified. You may be a Rogue Trader, but I have my orders. And if I don't follow them, the governor will have my tongue ripped out and demote me to a servitor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Te mira con tristeza y dice,{/n} «Pero aún así, no puedo revelar nada confidencial. Puede que sea Comerciante Independiente, pero tengo mis órdenes. Y si no las sigo, el gobernador me arrancará la lengua y me degradará a sirviente».

languages.text: {n}Yüzüne üzüntüyle bakıp şöyle diyor:{/n} "Yine de gizli bilgileri ifşa edemem. Hür Tacir olabilirsiniz ama emir emirdir. Emirlere uymazsam sayın vali, dilimi koparıp hizmetöre indirger beni."
languages.original_text: {n}He glances at you sadly and says,{/n} "But still, I can't divulge anything classified. You may be a Rogue Trader, but I have my orders. And if I don't follow them, the governor will have my tongue ripped out and demote me to a servitor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yüzüne üzüntüyle bakıp şöyle diyor:{/n} "Yine de gizli bilgileri ifşa edemem. Hür Tacir olabilirsiniz ama emir emirdir. Emirlere uymazsam sayın vali, dilimi koparıp servitöre indirger beni."
